item.title: Mentioned by Daily Business Buzz
item.description:
New ferry!
West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on June 24 to announce a new vessel for the Digby-Saint John ferry service. Published on ...

item.title: Mentioned by Nova Scotia
item.description:
NS: Big news revealed for Digby-Saint John ferry - Daily Business Buzz
NS: Big news revealed for Digby-Saint John ferry. West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on Monday for the announcement.

item.title: Mentioned by Digby Courier
item.description:
New ferry for Digby-Saint John service
West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on Monday, June 23 to announce a few vessel for the Digby-Saint John ferry service.
